title: ELLE typeface
content:
Hi, I really need to know what typeface is used for the ELLE magazine logo?  
Can anyone help please?  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127012959im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ElleMagazine_3768.JPG)
author: nicoletteaugustin

comments.content: It looks like [Torino](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127012959/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/attorino/at-torino-condensed/) to me, but might have some customization done to letter width.
